SEARCH:
Package virusvoid.gui.other

Klasse SpaceshipKeyListener

java.lang.Object
virusvoid.gui.other.SpaceshipKeyListener
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class SpaceshipKeyListener extends Object implements KeyListener
The SpaceshipKeyListener class implements a KeyListener for spaceship movement in the game. It listens for keyboard inputs, updates the spaceship's location, and provides methods to control the execution of the associated ScheduledExecutorService.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • SpaceshipKeyListener

      public SpaceshipKeyListener(SpaceshipLabel spaceship, int keyListenerType)
      Constructs a SpaceshipKeyListener with the specified SpaceshipLabel and key listener type.
      Parameter:
      spaceship - The SpaceshipLabel associated with this key listener.
      keyListenerType - The type of the key listener (e.g., game or tutorial).

  • Methodendetails

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Handles the key pressed event. The spaceship can be moved cleanly using the arrow keys or the wasd. Pausing and ending the game/tutorial is possible via this method.
      Angegeben von:
      keyPressed in Schnittstelle KeyListener
      Parameter:
      keyEvent - The KeyEvent associated with the key pressed event.

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Handles the key released event. The spaceship can be moved cleanly using the arrow keys or the wasd.
      Angegeben von:
      keyReleased in Schnittstelle KeyListener
      Parameter:
      keyEvent - The KeyEvent associated with the key released event.

    • keyTyped

      public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
      Handles the key typed event (not implemented).
      Angegeben von:
      keyTyped in Schnittstelle KeyListener
      Parameter:
      e - The KeyEvent associated with the key typed event.

    • pauseExecutor

      public void pauseExecutor()
      Pauses the executor service associated with this key listener.

    • resumeExecutor

      public void resumeExecutor()
      Resumes the executor service associated with this key listener.
